text: Panikos Hatziloizou (born 30 September 1959) is a retired Cypriot football midfielder.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Cypriot footballers Category:Aris Limassol FC players Category:Apollon Limassol FC players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Cyprus international footballers
title: Panikos Hatziloizou
